column1: Configure this section if you use advanced risk assessment module or if you have a FacilyPay Oney contract.
column2: Configure this section if you use advanced risk assessment module or if you have a FacilyPay Oney contract.

column1:
Define the PayZen information about the used shipping methods.
Name: The name of the shipping method (use 55 alphanumeric characters, accentuated characters and these special characters: space, slash, hyphen, apostrophe).
Type: The carrier type.
Rapidity: Select the delivery rapidity.
Delay: Select the delivery delay if speed is «Priority».
Entries marked with * are newly added and must be configured.
column2:
Define the PayZen information about the used shipping methods.
Name: The name of the shipping method (use 55 alphanumeric characters, accentuated characters and these special characters: space, slash, hyphen, apostrophe).
Type: The carrier type.
Rapidity: Select the delivery rapidity.
Delay: Select the delivery delay if speed is «Priority».
Entries marked with * are newly added and must be configured.

column1: Method title to display on payment means page.
column2: Method title to display on payment means page.

column1: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.
column2: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

column1: Click on «Add» button to configure one or more payment options.Label : The option label to display on the frontend.Min. amount : Minimum amount to enable the payment option.Max. amount : Maximum amount to enable the payment option.Contract : ID of the contract to use with the option.Count : Total number of payments.Period : Delay (in days) between payments.1st payment : Amount of first payment, in percentage of total amount. If empty, all payments will have the same amount.
column2: Click on «Add» button to configure one or more payment options.Label : The option label to display on the frontend.Min. amount : Minimum amount to enable the payment option.Max. amount : Maximum amount to enable the payment option.Contract : ID of the contract to use with the option.Count : Total number of payments.Period : Delay (in days) between payments.1st payment : Amount of first payment, in percentage of total amount. If empty, all payments will have the same amount.

column2: Select the gift card types that can be used for the payment.

column1: Click on button to add one or more new gift cards.Card code : The PayZen exact gift card code.Card label : The label of the new gift card.Card logo : The gift card logo to display on payment method selection page.
column2: Click on button to add one or more new gift cards.Card code : The PayZen exact gift card code.Card label : The label of the new gift card.Card logo : The gift card logo to display on payment method selection page.

column1: The number of days before the bank capture. Enter value only if different from PayZen general configuration. This setting is considered only if the buyer uses another CC to complete the payment.
column2: The number of days before the bank capture. Enter value only if different from PayZen general configuration. This setting is considered only if the buyer uses another CC to complete the payment.

column1: If manual is selected, you will have to confirm payments manually in your PayZen Back Office. This setting is considered only if the buyer uses another CC to complete the payment.
column2: If manual is selected, you will have to confirm payments manually in your PayZen Back Office. This setting is considered only if the buyer uses another CC to complete the payment.

column1: Enable payment options selection on merchant site.
column2: Enable payment options selection on merchant site.

column1:
Click on Add button to configure one or more payment options.
Label: The option label to display on the frontend (the %c and %r patterns will be respectively replaced by payments count and option rate).
Code: The option code as defined in your FacilyPay Oney contract.
Min. amount: Minimum amount to enable the payment option.
Max. amount: Maximum amount to enable the payment option.
Count: Total number of payments.
Rate: The interest rate in percentage.
column2:
Click on Add button to configure one or more payment options.
Label: The option label to display on the frontend (the %c and %r patterns will be respectively replaced by payments count and option rate).
Code: The option code as defined in your FacilyPay Oney contract.
Min. amount: Minimum amount to enable the payment option.
Max. amount: Maximum amount to enable the payment option.
Count: Total number of payments.
Rate: The interest rate in percentage.
